member.name: T:PlusConsole.Plus
member.summary: This class contains the main functions of the PlusConsole library.

member.name: M:PlusConsole.Plus.WriteASCII(System.String)
member.summary: Write the specified string value with ASCII characters.

member.name: M:PlusConsole.Plus.WriteASCII(System.String,System.ConsoleColor)
member.summary: Write the specified string value with ASCII characters and the specified console color.

member.name: M:PlusConsole.Plus.WriteASCII(System.String,PlusConsole.Figlet)
member.summary: Write the specified string value with ASCII characters of the specified font.

member.name: M:PlusConsole.Plus.WriteASCII(System.String,PlusConsole.Figlet,System.ConsoleColor)
member.summary: Write the specified string value with ASCII characters of the specified font and the specified console color.

member.name: M:PlusConsole.Plus.Separator
member.summary: Write a character line.

member.name: M:PlusConsole.Plus.Separator(System.Char)
member.summary: Write a line of the specified character.

member.name: M:PlusConsole.Plus.Separator(System.Char,System.String)
member.summary: Write a line of the specified character with a text.

member.name: M:PlusConsole.Plus.Separator(System.Char,System.String,PlusConsole.TextAlign)
member.summary: Write a line of the specified character with a text in the alignment specified.

member.name: M:PlusConsole.Plus.Separator(System.ConsoleColor)
member.summary: Write a character line with the console color specified.

member.name: M:PlusConsole.Plus.Separator(System.Char,System.ConsoleColor)
member.summary: Write a line of the specified character with the console color specified.

member.name: M:PlusConsole.Plus.Separator(System.Char,System.String,System.ConsoleColor)
member.summary: Write a line of the specified character with a text with the console color specified.

member.name: M:PlusConsole.Plus.Separator(System.Char,System.String,PlusConsole.TextAlign,System.ConsoleColor)
member.summary: Write a line of the specified character with a text in the alignment specified and the console color specified.

member.name: M:PlusConsole.Plus.WriteSection(PlusConsole.Section)
member.summary: Write the representation of the section information.

member.name: M:PlusConsole.Plus.WriteSection(PlusConsole.Section,System.ConsoleColor)
member.summary: Write the representation of the section information the specified console color.

member.summary: Write the representation of the error message.

member.summary: Write the representation of the error message with the specified title.

member.summary: Write the representation of the format string.

member.summary: Specifies the bar color.

member.summary: Specifies if numbers are display.

member.summary: Specifies the separator simbol for the numbers.

member.summary: Specifies the left simbol use as border for the bar.

member.summary: Specifies the right simbol use as border for the bar.

member.summary: Add a new line to the section.

member.summary: Return the lines of the section.

member.summary: Return the char use for the top and bottom border of the section.

member.summary: Return the char use for the left and right border of the section.
